code: export const scrollToSection=href=>{const element=document.querySelector(href);if(element){element.scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth'});}};export const scrollToTop=()=>{window.scrollTo({top:0,behavior:'smooth'});};export const isElementInViewport=el=>{const rect=el.getBoundingClientRect();return rect.top>=0&&rect.left>=0&&rect.bottom<=(window.innerHeight||document.documentElement.clientHeight)&&rect.right<=(window.innerWidth||document.documentElement.clientWidth);};
